text: Elpistostegalia, also known as Panderichthyida, is a type of prehistoric fish which lived about 385 to 374 million years ago.Elpistostegidae on the Taxonomicon == Why they evolved == A rise in the world's oxygen content caused predatory fish to evolve, and this fish was the most successful. == What they evolved from == Below is a description of their evolutionary family tree. ==References== Category:Extinct fish Category:Lobe-finned fish
title: Elpistostegalia
